column1: Local Foods////As what others have said
column2: the chicken sandwich is reminiscent to Benjy's Crunchy Chicken. Although
column4: the chicken here is even more juicy and tender. Afterall it is covered in some buttermilk ranch sauce. The sandwich has nut encrusted chicken cut into pieces
column8: and this amazing semi sweet pretzel bun
column9: which gives this satisfying soft bite with an added crunch factor. Sweet and salty lovers must try this.
